obvious.prefuse
Class PrefuseObviousSchema

java.lang.Object
  obvious.prefuse.PrefuseObviousSchema
All Implemented Interfaces:
obvious.data.Data, obvious.data.Schema, obvious.data.Table
public class PrefuseObviousSchema
extends Object
implements obvious.data.Schema

Implementation of an Obvious Schema based on prefuse toolkit. It is mainly a wrapper, Obvious Schema and Prefuse ones are really closed.

Author:
Pierre-Luc Hemery

removeAllRows

public void removeAllRows()
Removes all the rows.

After this method, the table is almost in the same state as if it had been created afresh except it contains the same columns as before but they are all cleared.

Specified by:
removeAllRows in interface obvious.data.Table
